meanings.definition: Having a specified number or kind of breasts.
meanings.sent1: The breasted robin had a red chest.
meanings.sent2: The breasted model wore a stunning dress.

meanings.definition: Having a breast or breasts of a specified kind or number.
meanings.sent1: The breasted woman wore a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent2: The breasted animal had a furry chest.
